alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Pennington Co Plains; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:02PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Haakon, northern Todd, west central Tripp, Mellette, Jackson, northeastern Bennett and southeastern Pennington Counties through 245 PM MDT/345 PM CDT/... At 201 PM MDT/301 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of Cottonwood to 4 miles northeast of Belvidere to 10 miles north of Wood. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mission, Philip, Kadoka, White River, Wanblee, Potato Creek, Parmelee, Okreek, Long Valley, Norris, Interior, Wood, Belvidere, Cedar Butte, Mosher, Soldier Creek, Cactus Flat, Cedar Pass, Black Pipe and George Town. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 123 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Pennington Co Plains; Todd; Tripp
